title: I need help...
body: I have a problem, yesterday I noticed that my skin ashe project my chest disappeared without a trace ... Someone could help or say it was at least what happened to me?

replies.body: I'm not sure exactly what disappeared on you. Was this a PROJECT: Disruption cache or was this your PROJECT Ashe skin?

it was on my loot i hadnt unlocked yet
....

If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and provide a list of items that are missing, an account specialist will get back to you in order to sort this out.

If you run into any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.
